titles.title: PANORAMA Act of 2020
PANORAMA Act of 2020
Public Accountability on Nominations Offered that Result in Admissions to Military Academies Act of 2020
A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense to standardize, collect, and analyze information on the demographics of applicants to military service academies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Public Accountability on Nominations Offered that Result in Admissions to Military Academies Act of 2020 or the PANORAMA Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to create a uniform online portal for congressional nominations to military service academies.
DOD must (1) establish standard classifications that cadets, midshipmen, and academy applicants may use to self-identify gender, race, ethnicity, and other demographic information; and (2) annually report such demographics.
